title: Expert Collaborative Problem-Solving Workshop Utilizing Educational Robotics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational robotics concepts, programming experience, and team project execution skills
context.additional_context: A course where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields solve complex problems arising in real work environments through robot simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and solve ill-structured problems similar to real-world tasks using robotic systems.
Learners derive optimal problem-solving strategies through role division and collaboration in 3-person team projects.
Learners apply over 80% of the four elements (shared resource management, role understanding, communication, planning and monitoring) of the PISA collaborative problem-solving assessment framework.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
